overview: Ji-hyeok sees a picture of Joo-yeong, Seong-ho's wife, and falls in love at first sight.  To meet Joo-young, Ji-hyeok invites Seong-ho to her house. 'Ji-hyeok and Jeong-hwa couple' uses the power of their boss to rape 'Seong-ho and Joo-young'. Seong-ho and Joo-young put up with rape in order to get promoted. Meanwhile, Ji-hyeok finds out that his wife Jeong-hwa is having an affair with “subordinate Seong-ho,” and presses Seong-ho to see if his pride has been damaged. Joo-young voluntarily visits Ji-hyeok for the first time for her husband Seong-ho's promotion.
title: Cheating wife's secret
